description: Datatsore regex support is missing for the ESX driver
title: VMware: regex support missing for ESX driver

comments.content: Datatsore regex support is missing for the ESX driver
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~garyk

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/54490
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=c27d2dcfa9ee1c91176bb98b0be5765948266e68
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit c27d2dcfa9ee1c91176bb98b0be5765948266e68
Author: Gary Kotton <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Oct 30 00:18:05 2013 -0700

    VMware: fix missing datastore regex with ESX driver
    
    When using shared datastore and the ESX driver the administrator
    is unable to indicate which datastore to use.
    
    Note: there were extensive tests added for the VC driver for the
    regex support. These are invoked by passing the flag for the regex
    when the ESX driver is created.
    
    Change-Id: Ifb0a4a8df2b26f3521b1301462d1f2c3eeba5c14
    Closes-bug: #1246206
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
